info.title: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} Release Notes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This Release Notes documentation includes information on the list of changes between Rice 1.0.3.3 (released ${previous.reldate}) and Rice ${pom.version}. There are no database or impacting changes between Rice 1.0.3.3 and ${pom.version} and ${pom.version} should be a drop-in replacement.
If you encounter any difficulty, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact the Rice team on our public collaboration mailing list at rice.collab@kuali.org

listitem.para: Bug fixes for two security issues of high severity and one at medium severity.
[KULRICE-6632] - KualiMaintenanceDocumentAction is modifying the http request parameter map which is not permitted

sect1.para: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} can be downloaded from the Rice website at http://kuali.org/rice/download.
There are three differient distributions of Rice available: source, binary and server. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on each of these distributions.
Documentation for this release can be found at at https://wiki.kuali.org/display/KULRICE/Home+%281.0.4%29.
